items.q: What’s included in a spring clean?
items.a: A top-to-bottom refresh: kitchen surfaces and appliances exteriors, bathrooms, skirting boards, window tracks, fans, light fittings, dusting, floors and cobweb removal. Add-ons like oven or fridge deep clean are available on request.

items.q: How long does a spring clean take?
items.a: Most homes take 4–8 hours depending on size, condition and selected add-ons. We’ll confirm timing when we quote.

items.q: Do you bring supplies and equipment?
items.a: Yes — our team brings professional products and gear. If you have sensitivities, let us know and we can use low-fragrance alternatives.

items.q: Can I customise the spring clean?
items.a: Absolutely. Tell us what matters most (e.g., fans, tracks, wet areas) and we’ll tailor the checklist to suit your home.
